roleset.name: choose, pick, decide on
roleset.note: OPT-V NOTES: "Choice"verbs can also take a source (choose one out of a group) orbenefactive (choose for), but I doubt those will appear with 'opt'. (from opt.01-v)

example.name: PP choice
example.text: With the new TV spots, Ogilvy& Mather has opted for a family style with lots of laughter, hugs and tears.
example.arg: for a family style with lots of laughter, hugs and tears

example.name: infinitive choice
example.text: But the company said the amount can't be determined until it knows how many managers *trace* opt to retire.
